properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-North Carolina border out to 20 nm; Coastal waters from NC VA border to Currituck Beach Light NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 2:24AM EST until February 13 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt and seas 3 to 5 ft.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Cape Charles Light to Virginia-
North Carolina border out to 20 nm and Coastal waters from NC
VA border to Currituck Beach Light NC out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 5 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 5 PM EST THURSDAY
